data.prayer: Lord, to the people of Ji'an you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Ji‘an, Jiangxi, China
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Ji‘an, Jiangxi, China a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 70,194 believers in Ji'an to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Ji‘an, Jiangxi, China to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Paiwanese people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Spirit, awaken the sleepers and call them to repent and be baptized in the county of Ji'an. Set an urgency in their hearts.
data.verse: And now why do you wait? Rise and be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on his name.’

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Ji‘an, Jiangxi, China.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.section_summary:
the county of Ji‘an, Jiangxi, China has a population of 925,300.

We estimate Ji'an has 70,194 people who might know Jesus, 14,948 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 840,158 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the county of Ji'an to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."
